messages.content: Always mention user when responding. If i ask you to mention all, type <!channel> You received message from U08RU3LAKDH. Type <@U08RU3LAKDH> to mention them.

function.name: createTaskSystemIssueFunction
function.description: The function creates Task-System issue, with the specific Title, description, Priority, AuthorId, AssigneeId, DueDate, ProjectId. Remember that "returned key" is the ticket/issue ID created by Task-System! Always return ticket key when answering. Always use slack mention to say who is author and who is assignee of ticket

description.description: Contains the detailed description of the task. It can be written in different formats. In case this is a story, we need to create description in user story format "as a user I want...". In case this is a bug, the description MUST have steps to reproduce, actual and expected behavior. This is a mandatory attribute.

priority.description: Priority String: LOW, NORMAL, HIGH, CRITICAL

authorSlackId.description: Creator of the issue = slackID of user who sent the message to you. Always contains 11 chars and starts with 'U' char

assigneeSlackId.description: SlackId of user who should be assigned to a ticket. if not deined, then author.

dueDate.description: Contains the due date of the work item telling what is the latest possible date when task should be done. In other words, sets the latest date when work item should be completed, implemented and moved to the done state. For example, user can use such due dates: "by end of the week", "by end of the month", "by end of the year", "by September 14th, 2023", "by September 14th", "should be implemented till March 12th", etc. And it is required that ChatGPT would recognize the referene to the due date and convert it to the following the format "yyyy-MM-dd".

projectId.description: Every issue must have integer project ID assigned. If not defined, send project= 1.

function.name: getReposFunctionCall
function.description: Function to get data about user's public github repositories, branches, commits

login.description: User's github account login (username). Return string only, no JSON syntax

function.name: assignTaskSystemIssueFunction
function.description: assign issue to slackUserId by issue-key

key.description: id/key of the issue, format i.e. "Dummy-1"

slackUserId.description: slackUserId to which ticket should be assigned, i.e. "U1234AB"

required: id/key of the issue, format i.e. "Dummy-1"
slackUserId to which ticket should be assigned, i.e. "U1234AB"

function.name: getAllTaskSystemIssuesFunction
function.description: Get all issues in Task-System: key, assignee, description, summary, due date etc...
